FEATURE SELECTION ON adult_delmissing DATA.
```{r}
# load the library
library(mlbench)
library(caret)
```


```{r}
Adult= adult
Adult$capitalgain = NULL
Adult$capitalloss = NULL
Adult$fnlwgt = NULL
Adult$hoursperweek = NULL

```

```{r}
set.seed(7)
Set = Adult[which(complete.cases(Adult)==TRUE),]

# define the control using a random forest selection function
control <- rfeControl(functions=rfFuncs, method="cv", number=5)
# run the RFE algorithm
results <- rfe(Set[,c(1:10,12:14)], Set[,11], sizes=c(1:10,12:14), rfeControl=control)
# summarize the results
print(results)
# list the chosen features
predictors(results)
# plot the results
plot(results, type=c("g", "o"))

```

Since native country and race are of no importance. So removing them too.

```{r}
Adult$nativecountry = NULL
Adult$race = NULL
Adult$age = (Adult$age - min(Adult$age))/(max(Adult$age)-min(Adult$age))
```
